Text.Page:
Jermir was scouting to the north yesterday, and returned badly injured.

There are iskaragards near the ruins of northern Ger, but they shouldn't have been any trouble for him.

Will you find out what happened? I can't leave him when he's so weak.

I'll consider any iskaragards you happen to dispatch as vengeance for Jermir's suffering.
Even if Jermir's injuries owe nothing to the iskaragards, I feel better knowing there are fewer of them.
